conclusion: Determine the maximum distance between the truck and the bus during braking using v-t graphs.
Truck starts braking at 40 m/s and stops at 30 seconds; bus starts at 30 m/s and stops at 20 seconds.
Truck's displacement is 600 meters using area under v-t graph.
Bus's displacement is 300 meters using area under v-t graph.
Initial distance between truck and bus is 30 meters.
Calculate position of each vehicle over time to find maximum distance.
At t = 20 seconds, calculate truck's displacement: 533.33 meters.
At t = 20 seconds, calculate bus's displacement: 300 meters.
Distance between vehicles at t = 20 seconds is 263.33 meters.
Maximum distance between truck and bus is 263.33 meters.
